price: E teu Senhor inspirou às abelhas: "Tomai casas, nas montanhas e nas árvores e no que eles erigem".
arabic: وَأَوۡحَىٰ رَبُّكَ إِلَى ٱلنَّحۡلِ أَنِ ٱتَّخِذِي مِنَ ٱلۡجِبَالِ بُيُوتٗا وَمِنَ ٱلشَّجَرِ وَمِمَّا يَعۡرِشُونَ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: wa-awḥā rabbuka ilā al-naḥli ani ittakhidhī mina al-jibāli buyūtan wamina al-shajari wamimmā yaʿrishūna
